fix(frontend): prevent login → error → リダイレクト loop by making 401 logout conditional

- Only logout on 401 if initialized と either Authorization header or local token existed
- Avoids over-eager logout on transient post-login requests (cookie timing)

Refs: router guard + /auth/login flow
